entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:26 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
